szip_adpt.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  * This files has neccesary definitions to provide SZIP DLL 
00003  * support on Windows platfroms, both MSVC and CodeWarrior 
00004  * compilers
00005  */
00006 
00007 #ifndef SZAPI_ADPT_H
00008 #define SZAPI_ADPT_H
00009 
00010 #include <SZconfig.h>
00011 /* Cmake will define SZip_EXPORTS on Windows when it
00012 configures to build a shared library. If you are going to use
00013 another build system on windows or create the visual studio
00014 projects by hand you need to define SZip_EXPORTS when
00015 building the SZip DLL on windows.
00016 */
00017 
00018 #if defined (SZIP_BUILT_AS_DYNAMIC_LIB)
00019   #if defined (SZip_EXPORTS)  /* Compiling the SZip DLL/Dylib */
00020     #if defined (_MSC_VER) && !defined(__MWERKS__) /* MSVC Compiler Case */
00021       #define  __SZ_DLL__ __declspec(dllexport)
00022     #elif (__GNUC__ >= 4)  /* GCC 4.x has support for visibility options */
00023       #define __SZ_DLL__ __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00024     #endif
00025   #else  /* Importing the DLL into another project */
00026     #if defined (_MSC_VER)  /* MSVC Compiler Case */
00027       #define  __SZ_DLL__ __declspec(dllimport)
00028     #elif (__GNUC__ >= 4)  /* GCC 4.x has support for visibility options */
00029       #define __SZ_DLL__ __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00030     #endif
00031   #endif
00032 #else
00033   #if defined(WIN32) && !defined(__MWERKS__)
00034     #if defined(_SZDLL_)
00035       #pragma warning(disable: 4273)    /* Disable the dll linkage warnings */
00036       #define __SZ_DLL__ __declspec(dllexport)
00037       /*#define __DLLVARH425__ __declspec(dllexport)*/
00038     #elif defined(_SZUSEDLL_)
00039       #define __SZ_DLL__ __declspec(dllimport)
00040       /*#define __DLLVARH425__ __declspec(dllimport)*/
00041     #else
00042       #define __SZ_DLL__
00043       /*#define __DLLVARH425__ extern*/
00044     #endif /* _SZDLL_ */
00045 
00046   #else /*WIN32*/
00047     #define __SZ_DLL__
00048     /*#define __DLLVAR__ extern*/
00049   #endif
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 /* If __SZ_DLL__ was never defined, define it here */
00053 #ifndef __SZ_DLL__
00054   #define __SZ_DLL__
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #endif
